Question
========

An ATM PIN consists of four digits from 0000 to 9999. You want your PIN to end in the number 0000. How many possible PINs are there then?

Answerlist
----------

* 1000
* 3000
* 3010
* 9999
* 10.000

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1000: Correct
* 3000: Incorrect
* 3010: Incorrect
* 9999: Incorrect
* 10,000: Incorrect
